reasons.C: This package uses C-Code, which can not be compiled by StaSh.
reasons.is_stash: The name of the package conflicts with StaSh.
reasons.is_pip: StaSh uses a custom version of PIP. Installing the 'pip' package would likely break StaSh.
reasons.lowlevel_os: This package uses (relatively) low-level OS functions, which can not be used with Pythonista.
reasons.processes: This package requires process interaction, which is not possible on iOS
reasons.bundled: This package is already bundled with Pythonista
reasons.incompatible_dependency: This package has one or more dependencies which are incompatible with Pythonista.
reasons.bugged: Installation of this packages is currently critically bugged.
